name: CurtainGenie
0:
”Alexa, open Curtain Genie.”
”Alexa, ask Curtain Genie to open curtain.”
”Alexa, ask Curtain Genie to check curtain status.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: curtain genie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Curtain Genie skill offers convenient voice control of connected smart curtains. 

To get started, register your smart motorized curtain online at x-motion.tech by following the registration instructions there. Then locate Curtain Genie skill in Alexa App and Enable the skill, and complete Account Linking to link your account with Alexa. Now you are ready to control your smart curtain via Alexa.
